cause.description: Just look at the daily news, our world is changing around us. By reducing energy use and recycling we can make the world a better place for generations to come. Just flicking the light switch off or throwing a Coke bottle into a recycling can make a difference. Whether we like it or not, the future of the environment is upon us.
cause.mission: Reduce engery usage and promote recycling.
cause.name: GO GREEN! (Original Verison) :)
